mapper.select: select r.*, u.*, f.*, sub.total from re_tb r inner join user_tb u on r.userIndex = u.userIndex inner join free_tb f on r.freeIndex = f.freeIndex inner join (select freeIndex, count(*) as total from re_tb group by freeIndex) sub on sub.freeIndex = f.freeIndex where f.freeIndex = #{freeIndex} order by reIndex desc

select r.*, u.*, f.*, sub.total from qnare_tb r inner join user_tb u on r.userIndex = u.userIndex inner join qna_tb f on r.qnaIndex = f.qnaIndex inner join (select qnaIndex, count(*) as total from qnare_tb group by qnaIndex) sub on sub.qnaIndex = f.qnaIndex where f.qnaIndex = #{qnaIndex} order by qnareIndex desc
